salientInfo: Have you had any experience with sales work?
Yes
I had worked for a foreign trade company for nearly two years, where I established business ties with several firms.
What exactly did you do at that company?
Visit customers, dispatch consignments
Did you like your work?
Yes,
when and why did you leave the company?
I left it two months ago.
I didn't think I could learn much there, and there were not many opportunities for self-development.
Why did you choose our company?
there are many opportunities to develop myself in your company.
I grew up in a city in the Northeast. I have lots of acquaintances in the region, which might help to push sales.

salientInfo: how was your vacation? You went to Paris, didn't you?
with my parents.
It was wonderful!
What sights did you visit?
we saw all the most famous places, the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame Cathedral... They were so interesting.
Did you take any tours?
a boat tour on the Seine River.
It was a great way to see the city.
Did you go to any of the famous art museums?
My parents love art, so they spent hours in the museums.
But for me, it was pretty boring. I'm just not very interested in paintings
my favorite thing to do was just to sit in cafes and watch the people. It was really relaxing, and French coffee is terrific.
sounds like a great vacation to me. But I have work at hand. Hopefully I'll be there one day.

salientInfo: Morning, Sue. Did you enjoy your holiday in the country?
We had a great time.
some friends went with us.
Where did you stay?
We camped in the mountains, near Snowdon.
We cooked all our meals over an open fire.
Was the weather good?
The sun shone nearly every day and it didn't rain at all.
Did you like the people there?
they were great. We met some farmers and had tea in their houses.
When did you get back?
This morning.
We got up at 4:30, left at 5 and arrived here at 9. I'm so tired.
Did you have a good weekend?
I stayed at home. The weather was terrible.
